errors.networkError: Failed to fetch stops. Check your internet connection.
errors.fetchFailed: Failed to fetch stops. Please try again later.
errors.browserNoGeolocation: Your browser doesn't support location services. Try a different browser.
errors.locationBlocked: Location is blocked. Enable location in your browser or device settings and try again.
errors.locationUnavailable: Could not determine location. Check that location services are enabled on your device.
errors.locationTimeout: Location request timed out. Please try again.

iosSafari.title: How to enable location on iPhone:
iosSafari.step4: Make sure location services are on
iosSafari.step5: Scroll down and select Safari Websites

iosChrome.title: How to enable location on iPhone (Chrome):

android.title: How to enable location on Android:
android.step4: Return to browser and tap the lock icon in the address bar

desktop.title: How to enable location in browser:
desktop.step1: Click the lock icon on the left side of the address bar

plus.supportDeveloper: Want to support the developer and get extra features?
plus.title: SeuraavaBussi Plus
plus.description: See real-time bus and tram locations on the map
plus.supportedCitiesList: Helsinki, Tampere, Turku, Oulu, Jyväskylä, and Lahti.
plus.otherCitiesNote: Real-time location data is not yet available in other cities (Kuopio, Lappeenranta, Hämeenlinna, Pori).

busMap.freeTrialRemaining: Free trial: {remaining} {remaining, plural, one {use} other {uses}} left
busMap.paywallDescription: You've used all {limit} free trials. Get SeuraavaBussi Plus to see bus locations on the map without limits.
busMap.paywallFooter: Plus: Unlimited map access and future features
